system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: POS terminals unable to process payments.

conversation_history.message: Our POS terminals are failing to process payments since this morning. It's affecting all our stores.
Thank you for reaching out, John. We understand how critical this is. Can you confirm if you're seeing any error messages on the terminals?
The error message says 'Payment Processing Unavailable. Please Try Again Later.' This happens for both card and cash transactions.
Got it. This might be related to the backend payment API. We'll escalate this to our engineering team immediately. Are you also experiencing any issues logging into the admin dashboard?
No, the admin dashboard seems fine. We can access it and see store-level data, but payment transactions are not being recorded.
Thanks for confirming. We’re prioritizing this issue and will provide updates as soon as we have more information from the engineering team.
